alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman; Stanley (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 03 at 9:16PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SOUTH DAKOTA... The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a Fire Weather Watch for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect from Monday afternoon through Monday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In South Dakota, Stanley, Jones and Lyman. * WINDS...South 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...20 to 25 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds, lowering humidity, and dry fuels may bring critical fire danger to portions of south central South Dakota.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
